articles.title: Photos of Harvey Weinstein's ‘deformed’ genitalia shown to jury in LA sex crimes trial - New York Post
articles.description: The jury on Harvey Weinstein’s Los Angeles sex crimes trial was shown photos of the disgraced Hollywood movie mogul’s genitalia on Friday.
